author: Claire Atkinson
title: From liquor brands to car factories, production lines now resemble the war effort
description: From fashion brands to automakers to Silicon Valley tech firms, big business is stepping up to help fight the spread of coronavirus in ways that are starting to resemble the World War II effort.
content:
From fashion brands to automakers to Silicon Valley tech firms, big business is stepping up to help fight the spread of the coronavirus in ways that are starting to resemble the World War II effort.
